channel.title: Help! (please read)
channel.description: Ok i am wondering if anyone can help me with like you know a rare shop because i just wanted to put up a rare shop so i used auto spawn.cfg and i spawned santa and i went to shops.cfg and i put shop 44 and then i put in all the stuff that i wanted too be in there and now i go on the server and I cant trade santa any help???

item.title: Help! (please read)
item.dc:creator: @ash31 ash31
item.description:
@ash31 wrote:

you didnt add the thing in client.java , that lets u trade with him>>

delete what ever u added to shop.cfg, but leave the npc u added.

What to put in shop.cfg

ok go to the end of shop.cfg and add:

shop = 30	Rare_items_store.				2	2	1038	100	1040	100	1044	100	1046	100	1048	100	1050	100	1053	100	1055	100	1057	100

change the ‘shop=30’ to shop=44 .

what to add in client.java

first search for :

} else if (NPCID == 553) { //Aubury rune shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 2; //Aubury Magic Shop

under it add:

} else if (NPCID == 1699) { //rares Trader PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 44; //Ashscape rares shop

change the 1699 to the npc id of santa or whoever is your shop keeper.

save , compile, run

Read full topic
